title: Son of Mine
writer: Gustaaf Peek, Remy van Heugten (original idea)
actors: Johan Leysen, Vincent van der Valk, Bart Slegers, Har Smeets
plot: Lei, descendant of an unemployed coal miner, is an aimless man in his fifties, living a hand to mouth existence. When Lei's son Jeffrey discovers that Lei has a long-drawn debt with Vester, a charismatic crime boss, he does what every loving son would do: He reckons his father's problems as his own.
